name: Notice.AAA6.MediationUnsuccessful.Claimant1NonAttendance.CARM.Claimant
descriptionEn: You did not attend your mediation appointment, and the judge may issue a penalty against you. Your case will now be reviewed by the court. Explain why you did not attend your appointment
descriptionCy: Ni wnaethoch fynychu eich apwyntiad cyfryngu, ac efallai y bydd y barnwr yn eich cosbi. Bydd yr achos hwn nawr yn cael ei adolygu gan y llys. Esboniwch pam na wnaethoch chi fynychu eich apwyntiad
